name: kanopt-monorepo
description: Agentic Kanban Sprint Optimizer - Event-sourced Kanban with AI agent

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:ai
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o bin/api main.go && go build -o bin/agent cmd/agent/main.go
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:ai
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && go mod tidy && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
